name: Videocart-7: Math Quiz II  (Multiplication & Division)
overview: Get one problem right and a new one appears. Take turns with a buddy to double the competition... And quadruple the fun! Math Quiz - Multiplication: Teach the kids to multiply while you practice your time tables. Do it in your head or sneak a look at your calculator. Any way you figure it, the product is fun! Math Quiz - Division: Think you're equal to our problem? If you've got our number, you score. If not, you get another try before the screen works it out for you. Makes long division half the work and twice the fun!
